fill_infos: Please fill in the information to be able to auction your asset
title: Title*
first_term: 1. To participate in the auction for granting government commercial, residential, commercial and industrial lands and investment landsusing the usufruct right system through public auction, the followingare required:
second_term: To be an Omani natural person, or a company (legal person), in which the Omani or GCC nationals’ contribution is not less than (30%).
third_term: Registration through the electronic system using the ID number or the commercial register, with the need to ensure that the conditions for entering the auction are met.
fourth_term: Bidding shall be on each site individually electronically.
fifth_term: The value of participation in the auction is (500) five hundred Omani riyals that are refundable for those who did not win the auction, in addition to (100) one hundred riyals that are non-refundable, and this does not include the registration fees on the electronic platform.
browse_auctions:
With LEILAM, you can now browse through thousands of
auctions to find your next big purchase
condition: To participate in the auction for granting government commercial, residential, commercial and industrial lands and investment lands using the usufruct right system through public auction, the following are required
part_two: Once the auction is closed, the winner (who submitted the highest price) must accept the payment of the usufruct value of the square meter of the land being auctioned according to the price he submitted
part_three: The winner will be contacted with the outcome of the auction by text message to review the ministry within (10) ten working days from the date of the notification to complete the procedures and contract. The award and confiscation of the subscription value
condition4: The first contract is issued for a period of (2) two years, subject to renewal, and is renewed every (5) five years after the completion of implementation, or according to the mortgage period in the case of financing, provided that the total period of the contract does not exceed (99) ninety-nine years
condition5: The beneficiary is obligated to complete the architectural drawings and maps for the final conception of the project in accordance with the engineering, technical and administrative procedures and requirements for the concerned authorities to approve them, issue building permits and the necessary licenses in accordance with the applicable regulations, and pay the prescribed fees for issuing such licenses.
condition6: The beneficiary must start executing the project within a period not exceeding (2) two years from the date of registering the usufruct contract, and the contract is considered void in the event that implementation is not started at the end of that period, and the Ministry has the right to restore the situation to what it was before signing the contract at the expense of the beneficiary
condition7: Responsibility for delivering services to and within the boundaries of the plot, the fees incurred in connection and any other fees, are at the expense of the beneficiary, and he must submit his initial data to the agencies and companies concerned with the delivery of services, in order to determine the available options for delivery in accordance with the laws and regulations in force
condition8: The beneficiary shall be responsible for managing, maintaining and cleaning the project facilities and all its elements that are constructed throughout the period of use, as well as any other responsibilities resulting from his exploitation and use of the site
condition9: Ministry has the right not to assign the auction to any of the applicants after the end of the bidding, if it considers that the offered price is not achieving the desired goal or because the submitted project does not serve the development in the state in which the land was signed or for any other reason
term1: To be an Omani natural person, or a company (legal person), in which the Omani or GCC nationals' contribution is not less than (30%)
term2: Registration through the electronic system using the ID number or the commercial register, with the need to ensure that the conditions for entering the auction are met
term3: Bidding shall be on each site individually electronically
term4: The value of participating in the auction is (500) five hundred Omani riyals, refundable for those who did not win the auction, and this does not include the registration fees on the electronic platform
term5: Inspection of the site is an examination due to ignorance before participating in the bidding, and accordingly the bidder is considered to have fulfilled this condition just for his participation so that he cannot later claim any ignorance regarding the site, and bear the costs incurred in case of preparing or reclaiming the site for the establishment of the project

name: Name
reason_for_the_rejection: Reason for the rejection of invoice will be written here
buyer_willing_to_buy_registration: Before participating in any auction, you will have to be a registered bidder. Bidders will have to provide their full name, email, and phone number. After registration bidders will directly be considered approved to participate in any auction.
certifiers_to_you_answer: Bidders should keep in mind that admins are the managing group in the platform. They have all the detailed information this platform has. Bidders should keep in mind that all the listed auctions cannot and will not be in way spams. This is because auctions are reviewed and approved by these same admins. Admins have the right to terminate any bidder account if any illegal or irrelevant action was taken by a bidder.
bidder_lose_an_auction_answer: The bidder can lose an auction if he/she has been out bided or if the total auction amount did not meet the minimum bid amount or another bidder participate with higher amount and the auction closed.
Note_in_both: Note: In both conditions, the deposit will be refunded.
certifiers_to_you_awarded_an_auction: After the auction is awarded to the first bidder, the bidder will get few days that mentioned in award certificate. If the awarded bidder fails to contact the broker. The property will be able to be listed in the auctions again.
certifiers_to_you_Once_you_bid: Once a bidder places his/her first bid, the bidder is stating the will in purchasing a specific property. By the presence of the admins in the platform, the bidder is also accepting that the auction has zero flaws and not in any way considered a spam. Every bid the bidder places will be considered final, and the only way to withdraw from the auction is by being out bided. If the bidder does not get out bided there will a probability of being awarded the auction. If there are two bidders in the last seconds of the auction, the auction time increases by 60 seconds until the bidders stop participating.
certifiers_to_you_fees: Buyer’s Premium: 3% of the final auction amount. Deposit: Deposit amount will vary depending on the value of the asset.
certifiers_to_you_participation: Bidders can participate in an auction by clicking the “Bid Now” button. Bidders will have to accept the terms and conditions before proceeding. Bidders are required to read those conditions carefully before proceeding. This will help everyone in reducing further unwanted complications. After proceeding bidders will have to pay a deposit before placing any actual bid. This deposit amount is refundable to the bidders if they were not awarded the auction, they participated in. When placing a bid, bidders can place any bid not less than the minimum increment price the auction has specified.
Unlike_other_online_auction_sites: Unlike other online auction sites, Leilam reduces its customer’s effort when preforming transactions. Now bidders will be able to have their transactions all through the platform through their digital wallet called “My Wallet”. “My Wallet” is where bidders will have to have the right amount to be able to participate in any auction. Bidder also can withdraw amounts from the wallet to their personal bank accounts.
Can_the_bidder_inspect_the_assets: Can the bidder inspect the assets of the listed auctions?
Bidders_can_place_appointments_for_the_l: Bidders can place appointments for the listed auctions. They will, simply, have to request for viewing through the listed auctions, either upcoming or live, placed in the platform. Bidders will have the choice to have the appointment to be either in-person or online. The status of the appointment can easily be seen through the appointments calendar.
Bidders_should_keep_in_mind_that_admins: Bidders should keep in mind that admins are the managing group in the platform. They have all the detailed information this platform has. Bidders should keep in mind that all the listed auctions cannot and will not be in way spams. This is because auctions are reviewed and approved by these same admins. Admins have the right to terminate any bidder account if any illegal or irrelevant action was taken by a bidder.
owner_willing_to_sell_registration: No, registration will be required from property owners to participate in this platform. Owners will have to contact license brokers to list their auctions. Brokers must be approved and registered in the platform and will be fully responsible to all the details they will upload in the platform.
certifiers_to_you-owner_answer: Certifiers are the managing group in the platform. Brokers that are certified in the platform are considered to be fully reliable to serve owners in selling their properties. Certifiers have all the information the platform has and have all the right to take actions toward accounts that preform any illegal or irrelevant actions.
certifiers_to_you_listing_auction: When owners and brokers decide to list an auction. Brokers will follow all the steps in uploading specific details of the real estate. Whether the property is a land or an apartment brokers will have to be very clear in what they will be advertising. Other than the details and documents of the property, the broker will also have to specify the different amounts the auction will also require. This will include the starting bid amount, the minimum increment amount, and the minimum bid amount (optional). Then broker submits the request, the certifier verifies the details of the auction and the validity of the information included and approved the auction to publish it the public. In case of rejection, a message will be sent to the broker rejecting the auction.
certifiers_to_you_fees2: Buyer's Premium: 3% of the final auction amount. (The buyer's premium is a percentage additional charge on the hammer price of the lot that is paid by the winning bidder)
certifiers_to_you_once_you_goes_live: After the auction has been approved by the certifiers there will be to phases the auction will go through. First is the upcoming phase and second is the active phase. In the upcoming phase is time the bidders will be able to look at the auction specifics to be prepared for. In this phase brokers will be able to edit certain things in the auction and will also be able to withdraw the property from the listed auction. Once the auction is active this is when bidders will be able to participate in. In this phase brokers will not be able to withdraw from the auction unless there are no participants. The property should be considered partially sold once it is closed the auction. Moreover, another chance of withdrawal the auction will be possible is if the bidders did not reach the reserve price amount.
reserve_price_amount_after_auction_award: After the auction is awarded to the first bidder, the bidder will get few days that mentioned in award certificate. If the awarded bidder fails to contact the broker. The property will be able to be listed in the auctions again
minimum_bid_amount: What is the minimum bid amount?
reserve_price_amount_owner_answer: This is an amount that the broker places before the auction starts to be the limit the broker wants to target his/her final auction amount. If the final auction amount does not meet the minimum bid amount, the broker will be notified of the highest bid submitted during the auction. The broker will then have 24 hours from the time being notified to either accept or reject the final auction amount. In this same time the highest bidder will also be notified to wait for the broker to reply to the agreement. If the final auction was accepted by the broker, the bidder will be notified as awarded and download the certificate then will be notified to contact the broker.
The_broker_will_have_an_option_to_add: The broker will have an option to add this feature on his auction while he creates the auction (last step is optional). Once the broker fills the last of viewing request, the viewing request will appear on auction details page. When the bidder request viewing appointment, the broker will approve or reject the request. Also, if the bidder reschedules the appointment, the broker has an option to reject or approve.
